title: Unstoppable
description: It’s time for Silas, the rest of the team and me to retrieve the last half of Saint Cain’s shield from the Greyworld. Not only is that how we’ll bring back our wolves, but it’s how we’ll save Skyla, Chase’s little sister.But the Greyworld, full of rebel magicians, war and darkness, will be an adventure like no other… The universe is tearing itself apart, and only we can stop it. I’ve been re-writing prophecy since I arrived at the academy.Now it’s time for me to live up to it. Don’t miss the exciting final book in Their Shifter Academy series
author: May Dawson
